import React from 'react'; import { withRouter } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Header, Icon, Image, Menu, Segment, Sidebar, Button, Grid, Responsive, Dropdown} from 'semantic-ui-react'; import { authenticate, getUser } from '../Axios/axios_getter'; import * as logo from '../Assets/logo.png'; import * as animation from '../Assets/animation.png'; class LandingPage extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { visible: false } this.setVisible = this.setVisible.bind(this); this.handlePusher = this.handlePusher.bind(this); this.route = this.route.bind(this); } setVisible() { const { visible } = this.state; const change = !visible this.setState({ visible: change }); } handlePusher() { const { visible } = this.state; if (visible) this.setState({ visible: false }); } route() { getUser() .then(user => { if (user.user == null) { authenticate() .then(data => { console.log(data); window.location.href = data.url; }); } }); } render() { return (
HOME
MEET THE TEAM
ABOUT COFFEE CLUB

Fair Trade.
Student Owned.
Coffee Club.

); } } export default LandingPage;
